ComicInfo.Summary:
Chase the Lady, Chapter 7: People undergo spiritual epiphanies.
The Once and Future Mr. Monster, Chapter 1: Mr. Monster is put in suspended animation until 3015.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 6: O'Connor tries following a ley line.
Hostile Takeover, Chapter 2: The acquisition of the business has been arranged.
The Once and Future Tarzan, Chapter 4: Tarzan and Jane have been helping Maia's people.
The Witches of Mars: Efi plans to do big magic to get revenge on the heathens who conquered Mars.
